# accountType

**Instance Property**

The type of the account.

## Declaration

```swift
var accountType: INAccountType { get }
```

## Discussion

If this property contains a value other than [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INAccountType/unknown], use the value to limit your search to accounts of the specified type.

## Getting the Search Attributes

- **accountNickname**: The nickname that the user assigned to the account.
- **organizationName**: The name of an organization attached to the account.
- **requestedBalanceType**: The balance type requested by the user.
- **INBalanceType**: Constants indicating the meaning of a balance.
